title: Writing the Matrix
text: We create a matrix such that one row has one equation. mat({5, $$-3$$, $$2$$, -5}, {2, $$-1$$, $$-1$$, 4}, {3, $$-2$$, $$2$$, -8})
speech: We create a matrix such that one row has one equation. mat({5,  minus 3 ,  2 , -5}, {2,  negative 1 ,  negative 1 , 4}, {3,  negative 2 ,  2 , -8})
